title: Plan 1Password wizard architecture
description: ⚠️ OPUS PLANNING STORY - Design the interactive 1Password setup wizard. Output: detailed plan in docs.local/1password-wizard-plan.md with architecture, user flow, and breakdown into implementation stories. Consider: file-based (.env, MCP configs) AND token-based (add single keys) modes.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Document user flow: scan → preview → consent → execute → verify
Design file mode: migrate whole .env, MCP configs, claude configs
Design token mode: ralph-secrets add <NAME> <VALUE> for single keys
Design visual preview format (ASCII table or gum)
Document helper scripts to generate (run-with-secrets.sh, etc)
Break down into 3-5 implementation stories for sonnet/haiku
Create story JSON files in prd-json/stories/ for each sub-story
